org.apache.solr.analytics.statistics

Interface StatsCollector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDelegatingStatsCollector, MedianStatsCollector, MinMaxStatsCollector, NumericStatsCollector, PercentileStatsCollector, UniqueStatsCollector

    public interface StatsCollector
    StatsCollector implementations reduce a list of Objects to a single value. Most implementations reduce a list to a statistic on that list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collect(int doc)
      Collect values from the value source and add to statistics.
      void compute()
      After all documents have been collected, this method should be called to finalize the calculations of each statistic.
      FunctionValues getFunction() 
      Comparable getStat(String stat)
      Return the value of the given statistic.
      Set<String> getStatsList() 
      MutableValue getValue() 
      void setNextReader(LeafReaderContext context) 
      String valueSourceString()

        Return the value of the given statistic.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • compute

        void compute()
        After all documents have been collected, this method should be called to finalize the calculations of each statistic.

        Returns:
